entry.title: Monica the Plush Cow
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 29.99

Description

  • Soft, squeezable, cuddly plush animal
  • Super soft, velvety-like fur
  • Baby blue, CorLiving pendant sewn securely in place
  • Designed for little hands and big cuddles
  • Appropriate for kids of all ages

Meet Monica!

Cows are very gentle animals and Monica is no different! Like many cows, Monica is incredibly social and is very excited to find a family that will love her unconditionally, just like she will love them. She loves to go on adventures and roll around in backyards with her favorite humans. Monica has had quite the journey and is ready to settle with her furever home.

All net proceeds from the sale of this lovable cuddle partner will be donated to charity and their efforts in bringing joy to families across the province. Find out more HERE

Specifications

Assembly Required No
Product Dimensions 20"H X 0"W X 0"D
Product Weight 0.6 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 5"H X 12"W X 10"D
Carton Shipping Weight 1 lbs.

Luka is an extremely sweet and loving puppy that loves to bond with his humans. He is always looking for attention and loves to be pet behind the ears!  Luka has had quite the journey and is ready to settle with his furever home. This handsome boy is looking to find an active home with lots of time to play around the house and in the backyard with him. Luka is an incredibly loving dog and the way he looks at you will have you falling in love with him instantly.

Meet Charlie!

Charlie is the prime example of a “gentle giant”. From day 1, he has gained a large fanbase and quickly earned the reputation of being “the favorite” among staff (don’t tell the others!) His friendly, mellow, gentle, and charming personality wins over the hearts of everyone who meets him, wherever he goes.

This handsome boy is very loyal, obedient, and affectionate. He loves getting pets and belly rubs – it is probably the one thing he could do forever. He has a laid-back personality and gets along well with everyone!
